q1.question: I cannot add photos
q1.answer:
Supported image formats are JPEG, PNG, and WEBP.

If your iPhone photos are in HEIC format, they cannot be uploaded. Change your iPhone settings: Settings → Camera → Formats → Most Compatible to save as JPEG.

There is no file size limit, but very large images (over 10MB) may take time to process.

q2.question: Where are photos stored?
q2.answer:
Photos are stored in your browser's IndexedDB (local storage).

They are never sent to a server - everything stays on your device. Your privacy is completely protected.

Note: If you clear your browser data, stored photos will be deleted. We recommend backing up regularly.

q3.question: What is the backup feature?
q3.answer:
The backup feature downloads your saved photos as a JSON file.

【How to Backup】
1. Click the "Backup" button on the photo management screen
2. A JSON file will be downloaded
3. Save this file in a safe location

【How to Restore】
1. Click the "Restore" button on the photo management screen
2. Select your saved JSON file
3. Photos will be restored (duplicates are skipped)

With backups, you can use the same photos on different devices or browsers.

q4.question: My photos disappeared
q4.answer:
Reasons photos may disappear:

• Browser cache/data was cleared
• Using private/incognito mode
• Opened on a different browser or device

【Solution】
If you have a backup file, you can restore your photos using the "Restore" feature.

Without a backup, unfortunately photos cannot be recovered. We recommend backing up regularly in the future.

q5.question: What are folders?
q5.answer:
The folder feature lets you organize photos by category.

【Creating Folders】
1. Click "New Folder" button on photo management screen
2. Enter a folder name (e.g., Portraits, Landscapes, Animals)

【Organizing Photos】
• When uploading: Select a folder before adding photos
• Existing photos: Use the 3-dot menu (⋮) → "Move to Folder"

【Practice by Folder】
Select a folder on the practice start screen to practice with only photos in that folder.

【Deleting Folders】
Deleting a folder doesn't delete photos - they move to "All Photos".

q6.question: Can I use this on iPad/tablet?
q6.answer:
Yes, you can use this on iPad/tablet.

【How to Use】
1. Open Safari or Chrome on your iPad
2. Access this app's URL
3. Draw with your finger or Apple Pencil

【Touch Controls】
• Tap the canvas directly to draw
• Pinch to zoom (browser feature)
• Scroll prevention keeps the page from moving while drawing

q7.question: Do you collect personal information?
q7.answer:
No, we do not collect any personal information.

【Data Storage Location】
• All data is stored in your browser (IndexedDB)
• Nothing is sent to our servers
• Works completely offline

【Data Stored】
• Uploaded photos
• Drawing data
• Folder settings
• Language settings

All of this data is stored only on your device and is never transmitted externally.
